article_title: Ann to cut 100 positions in restructuring, profit nearly doubles
article_text:
Ann Inc. unveiled plans to restructure its business, saying it expects to save about $25 million a year from eliminating around 100 positions and streamlining its operations.

The women's clothing retailer said it should see about $15 million in savings in the current fiscal year, but also plans to post restructuring costs of about $15 million,...
